item.title: 1/9/26 System Test
item.description:
Test Purpose

Verification of manual operation functionality

Results

Operated extremely well. No issues with control in the surge and pitch directions. The aircraft was stable with no risk of capsizing.

Controller: â—‹â—‹

Video

Next Steps

Next, we plan to operate it with the autonomous navigation software installed.

item.title: Seminars
item.description:
At OUXT Polaris, we actively engage in speaking activities to share the knowledge gained through our development with the ROS community and the robot competition community. Below is a list of our past presentations.

Competitions (Technical Documentation)

In competitions like RoboBoat and the Maritime RobotX Challenge, “Technical Documentation” summarizing the technical details of vehicle development is included as a scoring item. We have published the materials written and presented by OUXT Polaris in the past.

RoboBoat

Competition Date Author Title
RoboBoat 2025 2025/03/06 Kenta Futami et al. Technical Design Report : OUXT Polaris 2025 (Florida)

RobotX

Competition Author Title
RobotX 2022 Kenta Okamoto et al. OUXT Polaris: Autonomous Navigation System for the 2022 Maritime RobotX Challenge (Australia)
RobotX 2018 Shuhei Horiguchi Development of a navigation system with high function and high reusability for Maritime RobotX Challenge 2018 (Hawaii)
RobotX 2016 Suisei Wada et al. Journal Paper about the development for the 2016 RobotX Competition (Hawaii)
RobotX 2014 Naoya Fujimoto et al. Catamaran Robot â€œPolaris -Iâ€ for Maritime RobotX Challenge 2014 (Singapore)

Academic Conferences

ROSCon / ROSCon JP

This is the world’s largest international and domestic conference for ROS (Robot Operating System) developers. OUXT Polaris has had multiple presentations accepted.

Connpass Group: OUXT Polaris

item.title: Call for Sponsors
item.description:
OUXT Polaris requires funding for robot development, manufacturing, and transportation.
Therefore, we are constantly seeking sponsors.
If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
We are currently looking for sponsors through the end of March 2026.

Financial Sponsors

OUXT Polaris needs financial support to purchase robot components and cover transportation expenses.
We are looking for sponsors who can support us in this area.

In-Kind Sponsors

At OUXT Polaris, we are developing fully autonomous ships using a variety of technologies and products.
We will feature your products in blog posts tagged with your company name.
If you lend us your products, we will count half the value of the products as sponsorship support.

If you are interested in supporting us, please feel free to contact us.

Sponsorship Tiers

Gold Sponsor Silver Sponsor Bronze Sponsor
Sponsorship Amount Â¥1,000,000 or more Â¥500,000 or more Â¥300,000 or more
Logo Placement on Roboboat Large (max H 60 mm Ã— W 120 mm) Medium (max H 40 mm Ã— W 80 mm) Small (max H 30 mm Ã— W 60 mm)
Logo Placement Location Top and hull (one side only) Top and side (one side only) Top only
Company Logo on Team Uniform Large (max H 60 mm Ã— W 120 mm) Medium (max H 40 mm Ã— W 80 mm) Small (max H 30 mm Ã— W 60 mm)
Logo on Open-source Simulation 3D Model âœ… Yes (max H 200 mm Ã— W 400 mm) âŒ No âŒ No
Logo & Acknowledgement on Main GitHub Repository README âœ… Yes (1 line for logo + 1 line for name) âŒ No âŒ No
Company Logo on Official Website Sponsor Page 1 row per company 1 row for every 2 companies 1 row for every 3 companies
Acknowledgement on Web Magazine âœ… Yes (company name & logo) âœ… Yes (company name) âŒ No
Announcement on Teamâ€™s Social Media âœ… Yes âœ… Yes âœ… Yes
Invitation to and participation in OUXT results presentation âœ… Yes âœ… Yes âœ… Yes

Note:
When multiple logos are displayed together on the website, they will appear in the following order:
Gold Sponsors â†’ Silver Sponsors â†’ Bronze Sponsors.

For sponsors within the same category, the order will follow the agreement date.

Sample Sponsorship Returns

If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.

Sponsorship Announcement on Social Media

â–³â–³ Inc. will support us as a â–¡â–¡ Sponsor. ðŸ¤
We look forward to our collaboration!

item.title: Sponsors
item.description:
OUXT Polaris needs a robot fabrication/development fee and a robot transportation fee.

For this reason, we are always looking for sponsors. For details, please refer to the Call for Sponsor.

If you have any questions, please contact us.

Gold Sponsors

  • CLOUDIAN
  • FURUNO
  • Northrop Grumman
  • Tier IV

Silver Sponsors

  • Mitsui E&S Shipbuilding
  • Yanmar

Bronze Sponsors

  • NVIDIA
